page.title: 09FARMING
page.content: Over the last seventy years Chester- field has changed from a small semi- rural town into an expanding residen'l area.The main farming regions lie to the east and south west of the town and comprises 122 acres of arable and woodland.The main farms in the area are {HADY HILL. DOBBIN CLOUGH,WHITE- {BANK, PICCADILLY and GRANGEWOOD FARM. { }A survey of the farms in the area showed an average contraction of farming land of 43% over the last 40 years due to house building.Each farmer combines mixed livestock with beef/dairy herds with a small acreage of cash crops.Three of the farms rent out land to accommodate horse riding schools which have become popular in the last 20 years.The {RSPCA}reserve 5 acres for an animal shelter and boarding kennels for 80 cats & dogs.
